document_data.name: Chicory
document_data.mainbody: '''Chicory''' was a species of plant found in [[Faer√ªn]].<ref>{{Cite dragon/105/The well-equipped victim|35}}
document_data.Availability: * Chicory could be found for sale in the markets of [[Waterdeep]].
document_data.Notable Users: In the kitchen of [[Blackstaff Tower]], [[Khelben Arunsun]] liked to served steaming cups of roasted chicory.
document_data.Trivia:
* According to some, the process to create a ''[[staff of command]]'' involved boiling the wood of an [[ash]] tree in an ointment made of chicory and the hide of a [[spirit naga]].<ref>{{Cite dragon/101/Charging isn't cheap|32}}
* In the field of [[candle magic]], chicory root was a necessary ingredient to create [[candle]]s that, once lit, gave off an effect similar to the [[spell]]s ''[[blink]]'', ''[[see invisibility]]'', or [[shield (spell)|''shield'']].<ref>{{Cite dragon/179/Magic by Candlelight|19}}
